column2: an A.M. Eatery////This place was excellent! There was a 30 minute wait on a Friday morning
column3: but it was worth it. I ordered the OMG French toast with a side of hash browns (loved them) and my babe ordered The Snooze Classic with a regular buttermilk pancake. Everything tasted amazing. Our waitress brought us a complimentary sweet potato pancake which was also very delicious
column4: but definitely on the sweet side!! We will surely be back again
column5: there's so much more I'd like to try from the menu!
